item.description:
Richard has volunteered to lead a "hike" into the Blue Hills. He has indicated that he'd like to lead other hikes in the area and has requested the following be posted.


On Saturday, October 23,
at the Blue Hills in Milton, MA

http://www.mass.gov/d...

Reservation Headquarters
695 Hillside Street, Milton, MA 02186
617-698-1802

We will be doing a 3-mile loop of the Skyline- and White flag
trails between the State Headquarters and Rt. 28.
The hike should be easy-to-moderate with a small elevation
gains around Tucker and Buck Hills. Estimating a 4-5 hour day
hike.
I'd like to leave the trailhead by noon, 12:00pm.

Details:
email me: richardphung@gmail.com
call: 501.472.4491
item.name: Blue Hills, Milton, MA
